item_prototype.name: Nginx: Perhour Request Time Avg for "{#NAME}"
Nginx: Perhour Upstream Time Avg for "{#NAME}"

trigger_prototype.name: Logfile had lines which lead to parseerrors ({#NAME})

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template App Nginx advanced stats:nginx_adv[{#NAME},status_500].last(0)} + {Template App Nginx advanced stats:nginx_adv[{#NAME},status_503].last(0)} + {Template App Nginx advanced stats:nginx_adv[{#NAME},status_403].last(0)}>4
trigger_prototype.name: Too many errors: 500, 503 and 403 ({#NAME})
